Package wordsCount

Class wordCounterGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • wordsCount.wordCounterGui
  • public class wordCounterGui
extends javafx.application.Application
    The program use javafx libraries to display a basic gui, which accept a input from a Url or local file, then display the result for all the words and their counts. Also the top 20 words and their counts
    Since:
    2021 -10-27
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gregory Lauture

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application
